subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Trying his best to shoot himself out of a slump, Gilbert Arenas launched a few bricks and rattled a few baskets home last night on his way to 38 points as the host Washington Wizards beat the Minnesota Timberwolves, 112-100.
snippet: Trying his best to shoot himself out of a slump, Gilbert Arenas launched a few bricks and rattled a few baskets home last night on his way to 38 points as the host Washington Wizards beat the Minnesota Timberwolves, 112-100.
